member.name: P:Ascon.Pilot.SDK.ITransition.AvailableForPositionsSource
member.summary:
Access rigths for the transition. There are two kinds of values in this array:
1) Role (starts from & char). Role is a pointer to the object attribute of type Organisation Unit that contains identifiers of positions and departments which are allowed to make this transition.
2) Organisation unit (looks like an ordinary integer). Identifier of a position or department that is allowed to make this transition.
Null value indicates that transition is available for everyone who has Edit access to the object.
Ignored in server activities.
